Sentence: The new superconductor (Li 1âx Fe x )OHFeSe with T c above 40 K synthesized by a novel hydrothermal method has proved to be an ideal system to investigate the intrinsic physical mechanism of FeSe-based superconductors, since the stacking structure of the Li 1âx Fe x OH layers and FeSe layers reduces their instability and extreme sensitivity to atmosphere and temperature .
